steps.title: Draw a cross outline.
steps.content: Draw a cross outline. Draw a small square in the middle of your outline. You can use a ruler to help draw straight lines.

steps.title: Draw more squares of the same size.
steps.content: Draw more squares of the same size. Draw one above and below the first square you drew and one on each side.

steps.title: Draw 2 more squares below the bottom square.
steps.content: Draw 2 more squares below the bottom square.

steps.title: Divide the squares on the left and on the right of the cross, vertically and the remaining squares horizontally.
steps.content: Divide the squares on the left and on the right of the cross, vertically and the remaining squares horizontally.

steps.title: Draw the center with a marker.
steps.content: Draw the center with a marker. Make it thick and dark.

steps.title: Draw a cross outline.
steps.content: Draw a cross outline. Draw a small square in the middle of your outline.

steps.title: Draw more squares of the same size.
steps.content: Draw more squares of the same size. Draw one above and below the first square you drew and one on each side, just like the first method.

steps.title: Draw 2 more squares below the bottom square.
steps.content: Draw 2 more squares below the bottom square.

steps.title: With a compass draw 3 circles each for the arms of the cross.
steps.content: With a compass draw 3 circles each for the arms of the cross. The diameter of each circle is equal to one side of the square. Use the guidelines to align the circles.

steps.title: Fill in the shapes with the color you want.
steps.content: Fill in the shapes with the color you want.
